mapper.select: select e.emp_name, h.hol_no, h.hol_date from attendance.employees e join attendance.holidays h on e.emp_no = h.emp_no where to_char(h.hol_date, 'YYYY-MM') = #{yearMonth} order by h.hol_date
mapper.insert: insert into holidays (hol_no, hol_date, hol_content, emp_no) values (attendance.holiday_holidayno_seq.nextval, #{holDate} ,#{holContent}, 1)
